en.@company_business_development_title: Do not just develop it, own it
en.@company_business_development_descriptio: At Togree, we care about every step required to make your business a great one. We extend our company's culture and business strategies to help your business get it to the ground and enhance it with the potential to grow amazingly.
en.@company_technical_support_title: Providing technical support to an exception level
en.@company_technical_support_description: Our technical team are experienced and willing to help you when the need arises. We also provide our custom IoT Tracking software platform Trackgree that allows our clients and business partners to track their products with their mobile devices to personal computers.
en.@company_training_description: In extending our company's culture and business strategies, we help our partners and clients with educational packages tailored to grow their businesses and retain their relevance in the industry.
en.@company_marketing_strategy_description: Reaching out to potential customers in a noisy world is getting complicated for businesses. At Togree, we help our clients get their words to the right customers at the right time with our highly trained marketing experts who can bring traction to your business using both traditional and modern marketing strategies.
en.@company_contact_us_title: Thank you for your interest in `_@company_title_`, please fill out the provided form and we will contact you once we receive your enquiry or suggestion.
en.@why_choose_us:
As a client, investing in technology means expecting results and maximizing your return and at `_@company_title_`, we couldn’t agree more. The following are reasons why you should choose `_@company_title_` : [>Outstanding Value [_>>We aim at providing you with transcendent certified GPS products at a competitive value with pocket friendly prices.]
[>Continuous software updates [_>>Using our GPS tracking devices and our various platforms, we continue to improve and update our services to ensure that you receive up-to-date information about our products and services.]
[>Product warranties [_>>We ensure that we provide the most durable and reliable products by backing up our GPS fleet tracking devices with a one-year warrantee]
[>Custom GPS solutions [_>>With the help of our exclusive tracking GPS tracking system, we are able to help our clients customize their fleet tracking devices with the tools that they will need and eliminate those that they won’t need. As our client, you have a variety to choose from such as activity report trucks, speed reports, real time update, map re reading, fuel monitoring among others.]
en.we_will_help_you_build_your_own_store: We will help you build your own store
en.position_availability_in_weak_gps_area: Position Availability in weak GPS Area
en.our_reseller_program_enables_you_to_be_a: Our reseller program enables you to be a business owner with very few steps. Get these questions answered and your shop is set up in minutes, not days. What's more, we supply you with all the latest products in GPS, car tracking, wireless communication upfront with very competitive market prices. Start earning by engaging in the most in-demand GPS business today. Our mission is to keep our clients and their properties safe.
en.our_engineering_team_is_always_up_to_dat: Our Engineering team is always up to date with latest technology and trends on our tracking system
en.with_our_delivery_service,_we_assure_del: With our delivery service, we assure delivery of your order, you keep track of each order you make with us, get notified when the order has reached your home/office
en.our_main_activity_about_us: `_@company_title_` is an information technology company that markets all elements necessary to get the full functionality of GPS fleet management in a desired environment. Our products ensure the safety of vehicle and Assets that you cherish the most. It also controls and reduces costs for connected and monitored businesses. Since `_@company_title_` is backed by reliable services, including flexible money back guarantee and highly dedicated staffs that are motivated by a passion for excellence, we will ensure that GPS installations as well as tracking / surveillance systems on all types of vehicles for our customers are well established. Moreover, since we know how important the customers and their lives are, we will ensure the safety and management in all sectors related so as to achieve a common goal. Thus we will follow a model of excellence to get there.
en.our_short_story_togree: We are a leading GPS fleet management equipment, wireless communication equipment with our headquarters in Kenya. Our main activities include GPS fleet management and wireless communication system, these are to ensure safety of vehicles and their families. With 3 years’ experience and more than 500 customers on board we are dedicated to building a GPS car tracking that will ensure a well-established tracking/ surveillance system on all vehicles for our customers.
en.our_mission_togree: Our mission is to obtain a fair share for fleet management and monitoring in the market. We fulfill this mission by ensuring our customer satisfaction is at topnotch and also taking advantage of the prospective inherit of this sector as we aim at making profit.
en.our_vision_togree: Our vision is to be the number one security company in Kenya. This is through offering Africa with new and innovative service options and also providing service delivery that exceeds the expectation of our clients which will result into job creation and security hence maintain a good profit margin. We also aim at providing tools for monitoring the global positioning system and fleet management hence increasing revenue, productivity and reducing loses to the company.
en.follow_us_on_social_media_to_keep_up_wit: Follow us on social media to keep up with us
en.with_our_gps_tracking_system,_you_will_b: With our GPS tracking system, you will be able to closely monitor all your vehicles from anywhere at any time. A well-equipped self-defense equipment and GPS tracking solution will help you protect yourself and your belongings.
en.you’re_one_step_away_to_our: You’re one step away to our
en.most_of_our_smart_cameras_comes_with_a_1: Most of our Smart Cameras comes with a 1080P front camera that records everything on the road and in the cabin. Our smart cameras enables you to get a more complete view of the situation in case of an accident or emergency, day or night.
en.leveraging_data_on_your_driving_behavior: Leveraging data on your driving behavior, including harsh acceleration, harsh braking, and extreme cornering will help reduce your fleet’s accident rate and improve fuel economy.
en.featuring_the_classic_dual-camera_design: Featuring the classic dual-camera design with simultaneous recording, the JC400P keeps an eye on the road ahead and the driver’s cabin using high-definition cameras that produce a crystal-clear image. The tamer-proof lock allows you to ensure that the SIM and TF cards cannot be removed, ensuring that your device and vehicle remain safety and consistently in operation. Finally, the easy installation means you will not have to fork out a lot of cash for expensive professional installations.
en.in_the_event_of_a_serious_accident,_coll: In the event of a serious accident, collision or improper driving behavior, the video will be automatically transmitted to the cloud. With a 4G connection, you can get faster data speeds and larger network coverage, allowing you to respond or take action immediately.
en.maximize_profitability_by_optimizing_you: Maximize profitability by optimizing your operations, streamlining processes, and maintaining a sustainable advantage over competitors.
en.reduce_fuel_and_maintenance_costs_by_mor: Reduce fuel and maintenance costs by more intelligently monitoring and managing driver and vehicle performance. Optimize the efficiency of your fleet performance with real-time alerts and notifications, as well as automated reporting.
en.achieve_comprehensive_visibility_with_re: Achieve comprehensive visibility with real-time monitoring of location, vehicle, and driver data.

en.@how_do_we_Operate_content:
At `_@company_title_`, our focal point of attention has always focused on our clients and partners' needs for excellent services.
We provide detailed insight into our client's needs, which includes providing sustainable technology and business infrastructure.
In filling those needs, we've created a well experienced team which helps in identifying and creating solutions based on clients' needs.

Watch the Full video for more.
en.to_view_this_video_please_enable_javascr: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
en.we_believe_the_spirit_of_togetherness_fo: We believe the spirit of togetherness fosters business growth. At Togree, we care more about doing businesses that have a great future. With our newly introduced reseller program, we help small business owners build their store and equip them with technological infrastructures and business development strategies. -newParagraph-Togree is open to help your business grow and reach its full potential. You can reach out with a click on a button. Our team is waiting to hear from you.

en.we_believe_in_a_greater_purpose_and_that: We believe in a greater purpose and that every member of our team is essential to maximizing our chance of success and becoming a great company. We leverage collective effort to make wise decisions and promote employee relationships that spur innovation and connect our team to the big picture.
en.at_togree,_we_have_recognized_that_trust: At Togree, we have recognized that trust is the pillar of a thriving business. Our team and clients have always known us for our high standards in delivering our services and our strong ethics for building a business bigger than us. We believe in pure honesty and transparency.
en.togree's_future_depends_heavily_on_our_c: Togree's future depends heavily on our customers; we have made it an integral part of our business to listen to their experience and always be on their side by providing top-quality products and services. Our high customer service standard has helped us win the heart of our customers and partners.

en.we_provide_a_vasts_of_products_and_servi:
We provide a vasts of products and services that are primarily focused on automotive tracking solutions and Personal monitoring.
Our products include; State-of-the-art, maintenance of faulty, the provision of training services related to GPS tracking and lastly the installation of vehicle and human GPS tracking devices.
en.iot_essentially_makes_vehicle_tracking_s: IoT essentially makes Vehicle Tracking solutions a lot more efficient, economical and automated. Togree offers a wide range of vehicle tracking products dedicated for professional applications. We constantly upgrade our existing products and launch new ones to meet expectations of our customers.
en.join_the_togree_telematics_community_and: Join the Togree telematics community and stay in touch with service providers, software developers, and hardware manufacturers
en.all_orders_received_are_shipped_not_less: All orders received are shipped not less than 24/hrs after order has been confirmed, we also provide our clients and partners the ability to track their orders with our real-time tracking platform and that of our shipping partners spread across Asia and Africa.
en.why_should_you_track_your_vehicles_and_f: Why should you track your Vehicles and Fleet?
en.many_benefits_surround_the_need_to_track: Many benefits surround the need to track your vehicles with the availability of IoT vehicle trackers like TK08  and tracking platforms like Trackgree.
en.car_trackers_will_help_you_manage_and_mo: Car Trackers will help you manage and monitor your fuel usage, driver safety when an emergency incident happens, and also increase productivity in picking out the shortest way to a destination.
en.with_our_delivery_service,_we_assure_del: With our delivery service, we assure delivery of your order, you keep
en.with_our_gps_tracking_devices_and_our_pl: With our GPS tracking devices and our platform Trackgree; we are constantly improving and updating our service to ensure that you receive the most relevant and up-to-date information. Some of our latest updates include more comprehensive vehicle tracking and driver safety reports, sophisticated reporting tools, support for Google MAP, and more.
en.we'll_help_you_build_your_store: We'll help you build your store
en.get_quick_answers_as_our_trackers_come_w: Get quick answers as our trackers come with HD microphones that automatically filter noise and records surrounding sounds.
en.our_trackers_will_produce_480_hours_of_p: Our trackers will produce 480 hours of power, and its small portable size is easy to use, especially for young children playing around.
en.get_real-time_location_with_multiple_pos: Get real-time location with multiple positioning technologies that provide accurate information needed to know the tracker's exact perimeter.
en.togree's_personal_gps_trackers_were_crea: Togree's Personal GPS Trackers were created to give parents/individuals and pet owners all of the information they could want about their families/ pets whereabouts, and more in a matter of seconds.
en.our_trackers_help_elderly_with_dementia_: Our trackers help elderly with dementia to maintain the quality of life they don't want to give up while providing peace of mind to those who love them by delivering real-time location, geofencing and SMS alert when out of a specified area
en.with_togree's_tracker_you_can_get_quick_: With Togree's tracker you can get quick answers to your kids' location, speed, driving or movement information etc. Our innovative personal tracking products get you detailed and accurate reporting within a few seconds.
en.keeping_your_pet_safe_can_be_a_joyful_re: Keeping your pet safe can be a joyful responsibility that helps you to feel more connected to your pet. with our tracker you can know your pet's location in seconds if he/she gets lost.
en.vehicle_trackers_(gps)_can_help_you_loca: Vehicle Trackers (GPS) can help you locate and track your vehicles including cars, trucks, vans, motorcycles, etc. Togree not only offers GPS fleet tracking devices with basic features, such as real-time tracking, SOS alarm, and geofence, ACC detection, but also supplies vehicle tracker with high-end functions, such as temperature monitoring, fuel monitoring, RS232, RS485. Equipped with a GPS tracker for vehicles, you can enhance fleet security, improve stolen vehicle recovery(SVR) rate and maximize each vehicle runtime.
en.our_vehicle_trackers_can_send_sms,_call_: Our vehicle trackers can send SMS, call or send emails to prevent theft, and alert you in emergency times.
en.our_tracking_platform_allows_you_to_trac: Our tracking platform allows you to track your vehicle across all devices, feeding your vehicle's real-time location and movement, so you will be able to closely monitor all your vehicles from anywhere at any time. A well-equipped self-defense equipment and GPS tracking solution will help you protect yourself and your belongings.
en.you_can_create_designated_route_and_loca: You can create designated route and locations, and when your vehicle is out of the selected region, you get alerts or calls to inform you.
en.our_vehicle_trackers_utilize_the_global_: Our Vehicle trackers utilize the Global Navigation Satellite System, which provides you with the ability to track data such as speeding, idling, unauthorized usage, and providing accurate data to keep up with maintenance.
en.increase_your_business_efficiency_and_re: Increase your business efficiency and reduce the cost of vehicle theft and damages by tracking leased cars and getting alert on drivers' behaviours for overspeeding cases.
en.with_togree's_vehicle_trackers,_you_can_: With Togree's vehicle trackers, you can effectively manage your fleet by creating faster routes for drivers while checking on speed limits to reduce wear and tear in vehicles which could incur more maintenance cost.
en.using_vehicle_trackers_will_cut_down_emp: Using vehicle trackers will cut down employees from unauthorized use of vehicles, and it can also help in calculating fuel usage, which would be beneficial in predicting routine cost.
en.it's_black_friday,_and_we're_here_making: It's Black Friday, and we're here making crazy discount this whole week
en.with_asset_tracker,_here_you_track_physi: With Asset Tracker, here you track physical assets by either scanning bar-code labels that are attached to these assets or we use tags using GPS, BLE, or RFID which point to their location. We majorly focus on tracking items that businesses permanently own and use repeatedly.
en.our_asset_trackers_can_withstand_harsh_w: Our asset trackers can withstand harsh weather conditions like raining and dusty environments while functioning at a stable rate under these extreme conditions.
en.our_asset_trackers_come_with_an_ultra-lo: Our Asset trackers come with an ultra-long battery life that helps you optimize and locate assets faster even if the carrier power is down.
en.our_asset_trackers_provide_an_easy_synch: Our Asset trackers provide an easy synchronization between the location of assets and the monitoring devices which can be personal computers to mobile devices.
en.togree's_asset_trackers_provide_a_visual: Togree's Asset trackers provide a visual representation of your asset's location with unique features like Geofencing alerts. Leveraging intuitive charts and reports dashboard would drastically improve your workflow
en.asset_trackers_help_trailer_owners_and_m: Asset trackers help trailer owners and managers to optimize their fleets to increase business profit and reduce loss without stressing out, especially while dealing with large fleet size and workforce.
en.keeping_track_of_your_rental_assets_like: Keeping track of your rental assets like it's movement and usage as these in the long term will help your business minimize damages and increase profit rapidly.
en.getting_real-time_tracking_from_your_car: Getting real-time tracking from your cargos' departure and current location will help your business reduce operational cost while lowering the risk of lost or damaged cargos.
en.we_believe_the_spirit_of_togetherness_fo: We believe the spirit of togetherness fosters business growth. At Togree, we care more about doing businesses that have a great future. With our newly introduced reseller program, we help small business owners build their store and equip them with technological infrastructures and business development strategies. -newParagraph-One platform that lets you sell wherever your customers are — online, in‑person, anywhere in the world, and everywhere in‑between.-newParagraph-Togree is open to help your business grow and reach its full potential. You can reach out with a click on a button. Our team is waiting to hear from you.
en.most_of_our_smart_cameras_come_with_a_10: Most of our Smart Cameras come with a 1080P front camera that records everything on the road and in the cabin. Our smart cameras enable you to get a more complete view of the situation in case of an accident or emergency, day or night.
en.featuring_the_classic_dual-camera_design: Featuring the classic dual-camera design with simultaneous recording, our cameras keeps an eye on the road ahead and the driver’s cabin using high-definition cameras that produce a crystal-clear image.
en.our_smart_cameras_are_cost-effective_too: Our smart cameras are cost-effective tools for ensuring safety on the road and guarding against illegal activity. With clear 1080P HD video recording at 30 frames per second on a wide-angle 140° lens, our smart cameras will let you see every detail.
en.smart_cameras_can_detect_distracted_driv: Smart Cameras can detect distracted drivers and illegal usage of the company's fleet, reduce fuel and maintenance costs by more intelligently monitoring and managing driver and vehicle performance. Optimize the efficiency of your fleet performance with real-time alerts and notifications, as well as automated reporting.
en.smart_cameras_can_detect_drivers_behavio: Smart cameras can detect drivers behaviour such as overspeeding and a panic button for drivers to reach out in a time of emergency, get comprehensive visibility with real-time monitoring of location, vehicle, and driver's data.
en.this_is_a_new_vehicle_tracker_based_on_t: This is a new vehicle tracker based on the GSM/GPRS network and GPS satellite positioning system, which set multiple functions of security, positioning, monitoring surveillance, emergency alarms and tracking in its entirety`-n-`This real-time car tracking device gives you up-to-the-minute speed, location updates and detailed reports It is an invaluable tool for monitoring either a single car or an entire fleet of vehicles
